Pre-Game Insights: The Kansas City Royals played a sweep against the Washington Nationals and a 2-1 loss to the Atlanta Braves in their previous games.
The Atlanta Braves won against the Mets and had five hits in their victory on Saturday.
Alec Marsh will start for the Kansas City Royals, while Charlie Morton will start for the Atlanta Braves.
Ozzie Albies and Matt Olson have been performing well in recent day games against winning opponents.
Bobby Witt Jr. and Vinnie Pasquantino have been performing well in road and day games against NL opponents.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Fourteen of the Braves' last 15 home games against AL Central opponents have gone UNDER the total runs line.
Six of the Royals' last seven road games have gone UNDER the total runs line.
The 'Inning 1 UNDER 0.5 runs' market has hit in each of the Braves' last five home games.
